messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., "Mary Bianco" <
mummyone24@h...> wrote:
>
> Ooooh! What Hamtaro merchandise is out???? Two of my kids
love that little
> show. I didn't know they were coming out with stuff.
>
> Mary B


http://www.hasbro.com/hamtaro/

They're darned cute. Hasbro also made the little Pokemon
figures, nice quality, ours have stood up pretty well under a lot of
use.

Pam

messages.subject: Hamtarro was re:Nintendo/Electronic Games etc.
messages.msgSnippet: ... We just found them by accident today at Walmart! Casey is thrilled. She s sitting behind me right now figuring out how to make tiny little bridal veils for
messages.messageBody:
>>:::Segue::: (I went to three stores today looking for the new Hamtaro TV
>>tie-in merchandise that is supposedly out;>>

We just found them by accident today at Walmart! Casey is thrilled. She's
sitting behind me right now figuring out how to make tiny little bridal
veils for Sandy and Pashmina.

Life is good.
~Mary
